original_title: Price of imported milk powder slashed
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 24 (Daily Mirror) - Minister of Trade Nalin Fernando announced a significant reduction in the price of imported milk powder, aimed at alleviating the financial burdens on consumers.
Accordingly, Minister Fernando disclosed that the price adjustment entails a decrease of Rs. 150 for packets weighing a kilogram.
Further, the 400-gram packets will see a reduction of Rs. 60.
